name: 陳心怡
objective:
本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction; overview of academic writing genres; key elements of synthesis writing

Week 2: Essay organization: introduction, body, conclusion; review of unity and coherence

Week 3: How to use and integrate sources effectively (quoting, paraphrasing, summarizing)

Week 4: Reading and discussion of selected articles (literature/culture); practice identifying key themes

Week 5: Students propose synthesis essay topics

Week 6: Peer discussion and drafting workshop

Week 7: Selecting research paper topics; developing thesis statements

Week 8: Library/database workshop 

Week 9: Reading and analysis of a selected scholarly article; discussion of methodology and evidence.

Week 10: Refining research questions and thesis statements; creating an outline.

Week 11: Drafting body paragraphs; integrating primary/secondary sources; citation styles (MLA/APA).

Week 12: Peer review of drafts; revision strategies for clarity, style, and argumentation

Week 13: Introduction to narrative writing 


Week 14: Narration planning: characters, setting, and conflict in narratives


Week 15: Group project discussion 


Week 16: Group project discussion 


Week 17: Project development: peer feedback sessions


Week 18: Final showcase of group digital narratives; course wrap-up and reflection
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）
